issue.title: aol.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.9.40

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.aol.com/march-madness-2025-viewership-first-010140640.html

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Base filter, EasyList

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, EasyPrivacy, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, Legitimate URL Shortener, Fanboy's Anti-thirdparty Fonts, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List

_No response_

_No response_

_No response_

issue.title: cn.bing.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://cn.bing.com/search?q=hello](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcn.bing.com%2Fsearch%3Fq%3Dhello) ### Comment > 在使用bing中国版进行地址栏搜索时， > 启用adguard：首次访问无法加载出任何内容，刷新三次左右可以正常加载出内容 > 禁用adguard：首次访问可以直接加载出内容 > > 这也可能是bing中国版的问题，在一篇文章(https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/30314568616)的评论区内，用户讨论了可能的解决方案。在实际测试中，按照评论区用户"寒江"的方法，我关闭了拦截扩展可以解决此问题。 > > 谢谢。 ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/nssq1tz6ivk8480kkgowkg0s8gsgkk07yfqe4arbe4.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ptvfl8wukao4440w4kg088kkggs44cgq5r4sa0eovk.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v4.4.50 MV2 System version: | Windows 11 Browser: | Edge Tracking protection options: | Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header,
Self-destructing third-party cookies (2880),
Block trackers Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

AdGuard URL Tracking,
AdGuard Tracking Protection

AdGuard Popups,
